description:
Keeping it reel 🎣

------------------------------

Controls:

Swipe or Click & Drag up/down to reel

Swipe or Click & Drag left/right to swing

Reel up to go back to menu

Description:

Pilkki is a physics-based ice fishing game.  Try to catch as many fish as you can before the day runs out. Luckily, time seems to slow down when you have fun - and catching fish is fun, right? Be careful not to lose all your hooks though!

This game was made in 6 weeks for the Quickplay 2022 Game Jam. The theme of the jam was "Tradition." Ice fishing is a big tradition in Finland, and as Comfie is Finnish, we just had to make a fun little game about it!
